TwoSMAMACDSCR.Parameters: MACD Fast=12,MACD Slow=26,MACD Signal=9,Short Period=5,Long Period=10

TwoSMAMACDSCR.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy

TwoSMAMACDSCR.Description: Screen stock macd line above 0 and Short term SMA is above Long term SMA

TwoSMASCR.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the parameter for the screening

BasicADXSCR.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the parameter for the screening

BasicADXSCR.Description: Screen stock with ADX as parameter

MACD_HistogramSCR.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the parameter relative strength

RelativeStrengthSCR.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the parameter relative strength

SupportSCR.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the parameter for support line. Distance is between price and support line

ResistanceSCR.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the parameter for resistance line. Distance is between price and resistance line

StochFastSCR.Description: Screen stock fast K line above fast D line

BasicMACDSCR.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy

BasicMACDSCR.Description: Screen stock with DI+ above DI-

PriceSCR.Description: Screen stock with price above SMA lines with Period as parameter

BasicVolumeSCR.Name: Volume of the last day in a range

BasicVolumeSCR.Description: Volume of the last day in a range

VolumeSCR.Description: Volume of the last day above volume of the previous day

BasicDMISCR.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy

BasicDMISCR.Description: Screen stock with DI+ above DI-

BasicDMI_CutLoss.Parameters: Plus Period=14,Minus Period=14,Cut Loss Level (%)=5,Take Profit Level (%)=200

BasicDMI_CutLoss.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy. Cut loss Level defines the target in % of price for selling the stock. Take Profit Level defines the target in % of price for taking profit

BasicDMI_CutLoss.Description: Buy when there is cut between DI+ and DI-. Sell when DI- crosses DI+. Cut loss when the strategy bypass the cut loss level

BasicDMI.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy

BasicDMI.Description: Buy when there is cut between DI+ and DI-

BasicMACD.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy

BasicMACD.Description: Buy when there is cut between signal and macd line

RandomStrategy.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy

StochasticFast.ParameterDescriptions: Parameters Fast K and Fast D

StochasticFast.Description: Buy when fast K line above fast D line

StochasticSlow.Description: Buy and sell condition following Stochastic Slow

SMA_Stochastic.Parameters: Short SMA=5,Long SMA=10,Fast K=15,Slow K=5,Slow D=3

SMA_Stochastic.ParameterDescriptions: SMA define Simple Moving Average lines. Fast K, Slow K, Slow D define parameters for slow stochastic

SMA_Stochastic.Description: Buy and sell condition following Stochastic Slow

MACD_ADX.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy

MACD_ADX.Name: Hybrid strategy with MACD and ADX for determining the trend

MACD_ADX.Description: Buy when there is cut between signal and macd line

MACD_ADX_RiskMng.Parameters: MACD Fast=12,MACD Slow=26,MACD Signal=9,ADX Period=14,Cut Loss Level (%)=5,Take Profit Level (%)=200

MACD_ADX_RiskMng.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy

MACD_ADX_RiskMng.Name: Hybrid strategy with MACD and ADX with money management rule

MACD_ADX_RiskMng.Description: Buy when there is cut between signal and macd line. Sell with money management rule

MACD_Stochastic.Parameters: Simple moving average=20,MACD Fast=12,MACD Slow=26,MACD Signal=9,Fast K Period=15,Slow K Period=5,Slow D Period=3

MACD_Stochastic.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy

MACD_Stochastic.Description: Buy when there are differences in MACD signal and MACD lines, with Stochastic line K above D, and in up trend (defined by SMA condition)

MACD_Stochastic_Bottom.Parameters: Simple moving average=20,MACD Fast=12,MACD Slow=26,MACD Signal=9,Fast K Period=15,Slow K Period=5,Slow D Period=3

MACD_Stochastic_Bottom.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy

MACD_Stochastic_Bottom.Description: Buy when there are differences in MACD signal and MACD lines, with Stochastic line K above D, and in up trend (defined by SMA condition) and Stochastic Slow K below 70

MACD_Stochastic_Bottom_v1.Parameters: Simple moving average=20,MACD Fast=12,MACD Slow=26,MACD Signal=9,Fast K Period=15,Slow K Period=5,Slow D Period=3

MACD_Stochastic_Bottom_v1.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy

MACD_Stochastic_Bottom_v1.Description: Buy when there are differences in MACD signal and MACD lines, with Stochastic line K above D, and in up trend (defined by SMA condition) and Stochastic Slow K below 70

RSI_MACD_Histogram.Parameters: MACD Fast=12,MACD Slow=26,MACD Signal=9, RSI Period=14, RSI Over Sold=30, RSI Over Bought=70,Cut Loss Level (%)=5,Take Profit Level (%)=200

RSI_MACD_Histogram.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy

MACD_Histogram.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy

BasicMACD_LineCut.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy

BasicMACD_LineCut.Name: MACD using macd and signal line cut

BasicMACD_LineCut.Description: MACD using macd and signal line cut

MACD_Histogram_RiskMng.Parameters: MACD Fast=12,MACD Slow=26,MACD Signal=9,Cut Loss Level (%)=10,Take Profit Level (%)=200

MACD_Histogram_RiskMng.ParameterDescriptions: Period defines the input data for the strategy

MACD_Histogram_RiskMng.Name: MACD strategy using histogram changes with risk management

MACD_Histogram_RiskMng.Description: MACD strategy using histogram changes with cut loss

AverageStrategy.Parameters: Period = 30, Buy Level from Average(%) = 20,Sell Level from Average(%) = 15,Cut Loss Level (%)=4,Take Profit Level (%)=200

AverageStrategy.Description: Buy when price down to Buy Level, Sell when price up to Sell Level

PriceTwoSMA.ParameterDescriptions: Short Period is the period for the short term moving average line. Long Period is the period for the long term moving average line.

PriceTwoSMA.Name: Two Simple Moving Average Waves compared with Price

PriceTwoSMA.Description: Two Simple Moving Average Waves compared with Price

Price_3SMA.ParameterDescriptions: Short Period is the period for the short term moving average line. Medium Period is the period for the medium term moving average line. Long Period is the period for the long term moving average line.

Price_3SMA_Risk_Reward.Parameters: Short Period=5,Medium Period=10,Long Period=20,Risk Reward Ratio=2,Period for Risk Reward Ratio=60

Price_3SMA_Risk_Reward.ParameterDescriptions: Short Period is the period for the short term moving average line. Medium Period is the period for the medium term moving average line. Long Period is the period for the long term moving average line.

Price_3SMA_Risk_Reward.Name: Three SMA Waves at Risk Reward Ratio

Price_3SMA_Risk_Reward.Description: Three SMA Waves at Risk Reward Ratio

TwoWMA.ParameterDescriptions: Short Period is the period for the short term moving average line. Long Period is the period for the long term moving average line.

TwoEMA.ParameterDescriptions: Short Period is the period for the short term moving average line. Long Period is the period for the long term moving average line.

TwoSMA.ParameterDescriptions: Short Period is the period for the short term moving average line. Long Period is the period for the long term moving average line.

TwoSMA_VolumeFilter.ParameterDescriptions: Short Period is the period for the short term moving average line. Long Period is the period for the long term moving average line.

TwoSMA_VolumeFilter.Name: Two Simple Moving Average Waves with Volume Filter

TwoSMA_VolumeFilter.Description: Two Simple Moving Average Waves with Volume Filter
